text: William Richards (11 March 1878 – 1947) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Bury. Richards played in both the 1900 FA Cup Final and 1903 FA Cup Final. ==References== Category:1878 births Category:1947 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Bury F.C. players
title: Billy Richards (footballer, born 1878)
